title: Another Whirlwind Courtship
description: After jilting the president's son, Chelsea finds herself on the run from the press and from the first family. Her only hope is Cole Tremaine, who offers to hide her at his mountain estate. The trouble is, independent Chelsea had run from domineering Cole four years ago. Can she trust him now to protect her but not try to run her life again?
author: Barbara Boswell
